details.alloySmelter: Used to create alloys! Requires coal to run.
details.analyzer: Analyzes Asteroid Data Chips using power.
details.battery: Stores Power. Power can be inserted and extracted through any side using Energy Conduits.
details.blastFurnace: Used to turn coal/charcoal into Coal Coke. Can be upgraded to increase speed.
details.boiler: Generates steam using a solid fuel. Steam can be extracted using Gas Conduits connected to any side
details.charger: Charges items that hold power, such as Jetpacks.
details.combustionEngine: Uses Oil to produce Electricity. Oil can be inserted through the use of Fluid Conduits or buckets.
details.compressor: Compresses ingots into pellets and other useful things. Requires power.
details.creativePo?werSource: Supplies infinite power from all sides. Not meant to be obtained in survival.
details.electricAlloySmelter: A more efficient and faster Alloy Smelter. Requires energy for operation.
details.electricBlastFurnace: A faster Blast Furnace powered by electricity. Use Energy Conduits to supply power.
details.electricPurifier: Purifies items using a liquid filtration medium.
details.electricSeparator: A quicker and more efficient Separator. Requires electricity to run.
details.electricSmelter: A faster, more efficient Smelter. Needs power to run.
details.electrolyzer: Uses power to split a fluid into its atomic compositions.
details.energyConduit: Used to transfer electricity. Right-click with a wrench to configure.
details.fluidConduit: Moves fluids between containers and machines. Can be configured using a wrench.
details.fluidPump: Uses power to collect nearby fluid and stores it in the internal buffer. Fluid can be extracted with buckets or conduits.
details.gasConduit: Moves gas between locations! Can be configured using a wrench.
details.gasTank: Stores 20 cubic meters of gas. Gas can be inserted and extracted using Gas Conduits.
details.itemConduit: Transfers Items. Might break your world, so be careful.
details.liquidFueledBoiler: Uses a liquid fuel to heat water into steam. Steam can be extreacted using Gas Conduits.
details.nuclearReactor: Creates energy using nuclear fusion. Be careful, because splitting atoms is not safe!
details.quarry: Digs downwards up to 10 blocks left and right. Requires a lot of power to run.
details.refinery: Uses power to purify and refine fluids. Can be used to produced Refined Fuel.
details.rockCrusher: Crushes Ores into Clusters. Useful for processing asteroid debris.
details.rocket: What do you think this does? Load it up with Refined Fuel to find out! Can be equipped with drills and sensors.
details.tank: Stores 20 buckets of a liquid! Liquids can be pumped in and out using Fluid Conduits.
details.turbine: Uses steam to power a motor, thus generating power. Steam can be pumped in using Gas Conduits.
details.wrench: Used to configure conduits. Right-click on a conduit to access the configuration and shift+right-click to destroy a conduit.
